The Real Umbrella Lady

The real umbrella lady is my incredible mother.

When a random opportunity arose in 2005 for my mom and dad to meet me in London and then travel to Paris, she jumped at the chance. She bought Rick Steve's travel guides and planned the hotels, transportation, site seeing, and historical stops.

That trip ended up being the first of many - all of which my mom tirelessly planned down to the hour. My dad started to affectionately refer to her as our "Umbrella Lady" - a tour guide that carries the bright red umbrella so that everyone can easily see and follow them. With her preparation, they took trips to Spain, Ireland, Scotland, China, and Greece - some I was lucky enough to tag along on.

We have a passion for traveling the world and are thrilled to share that passion with you!
